response.original_title: Mujhe Bhi Ye Duniya Dekhni Hai
response.overview: The story revolves around a little girl Harsha, who has not yet taken birth because her own parents wants to kill her before her birth after revealing the fact by sonography machine that she is a girl child, her parents decide to kill her. She wants to enter and see this beautiful world. When her Mother Ketki admits in a hospital for abortion, the little girl Harsha comes to her mother Ketki and request her not to kill her. She also comes to her father Sahil and promise him that if she is not able to come this time, she will definitely come to his house in future. She comes to her grandmother Shalini & tells her although she is helpless but she wants to take birth through her daughter-in-law Ketkiâ€™s womb.
response.title: Mujhe Bhi Ye Duniya Dekhni Hai
